content: html and clarifications by sandi marshall yoke could be used for nightgowns or camisole-type tops work yoke in thread then sew to fabric to make a garment this is the part that truly determines the final wearable size sandi says to work a swatch in 3-double_crochet or 4-double_crochet per square or other stitch like half_double_crochet mesh to determine gauge then can calculate size and yarn yardage -- mine in 3-double_crochet mesh in #10 thread with steel 6 hook made a medium-to-large yoke
